section.section: On or before December 15 of the second year before the evaluation date, the Department of Legislative Services shall prepare a preliminary evaluation report on each governmental activity or unit to be evaluated.

text.section: On request of the Department of Legislative Services, the governmental activity or unit shall provide the Department with the information required to undertake the preliminary evaluation.
